form.urlHelp: URL of Jira installation (with context path).
form.disableRepositoryConfigurationHelp: Do not allow repository owners to configure jira instances. You have to restart your application server after changing this value.
form.updateJiraIssuesHelp: Enable the automatic update function. SCM-Manager searches for issue keys in commit messages. If a issue id is found SCM-Manager updates the issue with a comment. Note: It is necessary to configure the username and password or an access token below.
form.useAccessTokenHelp: Select this to use a Jira access token for this connection as an alternative to username and password.
form.useUsernamePassword: Use username and password for connection
form.useUsernamePasswordHelp: Select this to use username and password for this connection.
form.accessTokenHelp: Jira access token for connection as an alternative to username and password.
form.filterHelp: Filters for jira project key. Multiple filters separated by ",". e.g.: SCM,TST,ASD
form.roleLevelHelp: Defines for which Project Role the comments are visible. Note: The name must be a valid jira role name.
form.autoCloseHelp: Enable the status modification function. SCM-Manager searches for issue keys and status modification words. If both are found in a message SCM-Manager changes the status of the issue. Note: It is necessary to configure the username and password.
form.disableStateChangeByCommit: Disable issue state changes by commits
form.disableStateChangeByCommitHelp: Disables the state changes by commits. If this is activated, only pull requests will trigger state changes.

autoCloseMapping.title: Jira transition mapping
autoCloseMapping.help: Map keywords to Jira transitions in order to trigger state changes with those keywords.
autoCloseMapping.transitionHelp: Name of Jira transition which should be mapped e.g.: Done
autoCloseMapping.keywordsHelp: Comma separated list of keywords which are mapped to the Jira transition e.g.: closes, closing

jira.description: May modify the global Jira configuration

*.description: May modify the repository specific Jira configuration for all repositories

jira.description: May modify the repository specific Jira configurations

JiraCommitMessageIssueKeyValidator.name: Jira Issue Key Validator
JiraCommitMessageIssueKeyValidator.description: Uses issue key pattern from Jira plugin configuration

JiraCommitMessageIssueKeyValidator.name: Jira Issue Key Validator
JiraCommitMessageIssueKeyValidator.description: Use this to validate each commit message for Jira issue keys.

branches.label: Branches
branches.helpText:
List of the branches which should be validated separated by comma. Leave blank to validate all branches.
Example: master,feature/*
